entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @SenTomCotton @realDonaldTrump On January 22, Tom alerted the Administration of the danger of COVID-19 to the US while the potus was still referring to COVID-19 as a HOAX.   What if potus took action on Jan 22nd - how many Americans would have survived, how many less unemployed......
